mapper.select: SELECT M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_DT, M.MENU_KIND, M.MENU_FILE_NAME, L.LIKE FROM LOG L JOIN MENU M ON L.MENU_NO = M.MENU_NO WHERE USR_NO = #{user_number}
SELECT M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_DT, M.MENU_KIND, M.MENU_FILE_NAME, L.LIKE FROM LOG L JOIN MENU M ON L.MENU_NO = M.MENU_NO

SELECT M.MENU_NO , M.MENU_DT , M.MENU_KIND , F.FOOD_NAME FROM FOOD_SET FS , MENU M , FOOD F WHERE M.MENU_NO = FS.MENU_NO AND FS.FOOD_NO = F.FOOD_NO AND M.MENU_KIND = #{menu_kind} AND M.MENU_DT >= ADDDATE( CURDATE(), - WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) + 7) AND M.MENU_DT <= ADDDATE( CURDATE(), - WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) + 11 ) ORDER BY M.MENU_DT , M.MENU_NO

SELECT M.MENU_NO , M.MENU_DT , M.MENU_KIND , F.FOOD_NAME FROM FOOD_SET FS , MENU M , FOOD F WHERE M.MENU_NO = FS.MENU_NO AND FS.FOOD_NO = F.FOOD_NO AND M.MENU_DT = curdate() ORDER BY M.MENU_NO , M.MENU_KIND
SELECT M.MENU_NO , M.MENU_DT , M.MENU_KIND , M.MENU_FILE_NAME FROM MENU M ORDER BY m.MENU_DT DESC
SELECT F.FOOD_NAME , F.FOOD_CAL , F.FOOD_KIND FROM FOOD_SET FS join FOOD F on F.FOOD_NO = FS.FOOD_NO where FS.MENU_NO = #{MENU_NO}
